# tie

The goal of tie is to tie return values from function to 

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example}
library(tie)

x <- rnorm(100)
tie[low,up] <- range(x)
low
up

tie[,q25,q50,q75,] <- quantile(x)
q25
q75
```
